cast.overview: A live-action adaptation of Disney's version of the classic tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.
cast.title: Beauty and the Beast

details.biography: Isobel Hamilton was born on November 1, 1983. She grew up in a small village near Liskeard, Cornwall.She is an actress known for Set Me Free (Vol II) (2016), Beauty and the Beast (2017), The Crown (2016), Fisherman's Friends One and All (2022) Since 2016, she has been residing back in the West Country, after moving to Hampshire and Suffolk for ten years.
details.name: Isobel Hamilton
